title: Top 2024 Sport Trends That Tell the Story of Athletes Around the World
content:
These 2024 sport trends in athlete training are revealed by data gleaned from Strava, Garmin, Trailforks, and Ride with GPS. Here's what we found.

Read the full article at Top 2024 Sport Trends That Tell the Story of Athletes Around the World on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
